message.body: People are sleeping so we are being quiet...I am about to come home can we talk when I get there?
I heeeear u! ;) If u r Not alone pls don't say it's me. Bedroom. Just txt. If alone pls say so
Pls let me know about what time you'll be home. I might be in basemt or shower. Also if u want to eat at home, pls tell me; Nd to prep. I think dads working late.
Hope Anna got to Boston ok

To Paul & Za -Response requested ~~~~~~~~~ Tomorrow: • 10:15-?? Ddog to vet for UTI vs. nephritis. I'll take her; Za standby to pick her up at vet if they run late. • 12:00-?? I take Bette to Clay Nissan, Norwood. I'll probably be home After work is completed, so... • D likely to need out-back late aft: ?Za**. • Kim arrives between 11a & 1:30p. Works about 4h. **Kim will do this if asked. • ?t: I pay Bette's bail & drive her home • Shabbat chicken dinner for 4 at home? • Za or I need to go to supermkt 1 way or t'other.
Za- plan to exch texts about D late am, pls
Can u lv time to do SFarms run?
That was 4 za. 0 from Dad yet
Can u come to kitchen Za

Hi, Za. I spoke w Dad. He & I r both trying to get home by 7. Hope Boston's been fun & thx for the foodshop. Pls let D out. Unless u buy a different starch, there are at least 2 cooked white & 1 big sweet taters in fridge. No, wait!! Kugel into toaster oven!! 8p~.. . .@
350°. If preheat til ding, then ?12m. Check center deep. If cool, add time prn
I don't mind dark rubbery noodles, so there'll b something for everyone matter what. My 12 min was After ding. Dads might have been putting it in b4 preheat. I dunno. Gtg.
Just fake it like everyone else does. U will get the hang of it
